metadata.dcterms:title: Multi-year drought alters plant species composition more than productivity across northern temperate grasslands
metadata.dcterms:creator: Amgaa, Batbaatar
Cameron N. Carlyle

metadata.dcterms:description: This is the replication data associated with our article in "Journal of Ecology" titled "Multi-year drought alters plant species composition more than productivity across northern temperate grasslands". Please see the ReadMe file for details on dataset contents.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
Climate extremes, drought, grasslands, plant species composition, productivity, precipitation manipulation
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: Batbaatar, A., Carlyle, C.N, Bork, E.W., Scott, X.C, & Cahill Jr., J.F. 2021. Multi-year drought alters plant species composition more than productivity across northern temperate grasslands. Journal of Ecology., doi
